dt: {bc}a person promoting {a_link|human} welfare and social reform {bc}{sx|philanthropist||}

dt.t: recognized as a great {wi}humanitarian{/wi} for her work to end world hunger

shortdef: a person promoting human welfare and social reform : philanthropist

dt: {bc}having or showing disregard for {d_link|humanitarian|humanitarian} values or human welfare

dt.t: She had acquired all the appropriate gestures of revolutionary convictions—the gestures of pity, of anger, of indignation against the {wi}anti-humanitarian{/wi} vices of the social class to which she belonged herself.

shortdef: having or showing disregard for humanitarian values or human welfare
